Anointed Deacon.flavor: Inspiration is red as rubies, flowing like honeyed wine.
Anointed Deacon.name: Anointed Deacon
Anointed Deacon.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Seshiro the Anointed Avatar.name: Seshiro the Anointed Avatar
Seshiro the Anointed Avatar.text: At the beginning of the game, choose a creature type. Creatures you control, creature spells you control, and creature cards you own in any zone other than the battlefield or the stack have the chosen type in addition to their other types.

Vizier of the Anointed.name: Vizier of the Anointed
Vizier of the Anointed.text:
When Vizier of the Anointed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with eternalize or embalm, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.
Whenever you activate an eternalize or embalm ability, draw a card.

Seshiro the Anointed.flavor: His family was the first to reach out to the human monks. He soon knew as many koans as he did blade strikes.
Seshiro the Anointed.name: Seshiro the Anointed
Seshiro the Anointed.text:
Other Snake creatures you control get +2/+2.
Whenever a Snake you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

Anointed Procession.flavor:
"The gods here may walk among the people, but they are not with them."
—Gideon Jura
Anointed Procession.name: Anointed Procession
Anointed Procession.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

Forest Bear.flavor:
Fish and bear paws—one can't have both.
—Chinese idiom meaning
"you can't have it both ways"
Forest Bear.name: Forest Bear

The Great Forest.name: The Great Forest

Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

Khenra Eternal.flavor: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.
Khenra Eternal.name: Khenra Eternal
Khenra Eternal.text: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)

Defiant Khenra.flavor: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.
Defiant Khenra.name: Defiant Khenra

Earthshaker Khenra.name: Earthshaker Khenra

Haste
When Earthshaker Khenra enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Earthshaker Khenra's power can't block this turn.

Khenra Scrapper.flavor: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."
Khenra Scrapper.name: Khenra Scrapper
Khenra Scrapper.text:
Menace
You may exert Khenra Scrapper as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

Resilient Khenra.text:
When Resilient Khenra enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Resilient Khenra's power.

Nimble-Blade Khenra.flavor:
"In the Hour of Glory, the gods and the untested will prove their worth before the God-Pharaoh."
—The Accounting of Hours
Nimble-Blade Khenra.name: Nimble-Blade Khenra

Khenra Charioteer.name: Khenra Charioteer
Khenra Charioteer.text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.

Sylvan Caryatid.flavor: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.
Sylvan Caryatid.name: Sylvan Caryatid
Sylvan Caryatid.text:
Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Sylvan Ranger.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."
Sylvan Ranger.name: Sylvan Ranger

Sylvan Tutor.name: Sylvan Tutor
Sylvan Tutor.text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

Sylvan Yeti.flavor: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.
Sylvan Yeti.name: Sylvan Yeti
Sylvan Yeti.text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Sylvan Basilisk.flavor:
"We're not sure what one looks like, so to be safe, nobody look at anything until we're out of here."
—Parbold Drix, veteran explorer
Sylvan Basilisk.name: Sylvan Basilisk
Sylvan Basilisk.text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

Sylvan Library.name: Sylvan Library
Sylvan Library.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

Sylvan Bounty.flavor: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Sylvan Advocate.flavor: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."
Sylvan Advocate.name: Sylvan Advocate

Vigilance

Sylvan Safekeeper.flavor:
"How could someone so small cause so much trouble?"
—Nomad sentry

Sylvan Scrying.flavor: One glimpse of an elf's home lasts her weeks away in the wild.
Sylvan Scrying.name: Sylvan Scrying
Sylvan Scrying.text: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

Sylvan Echoes.flavor: It takes a huntmaster's eye to discern the contours of mythical prey.

Reach

Sylvan Awakening.flavor:
"Yavimaya is aware, but not always awake. You will know the difference when you see it."
—Karn

Sylvan Awakening.text: Until your next turn, all lands you control become 2/2 Elemental creatures with reach, indestructible, and haste. They're still lands.

"The worthy shall strive for greatness. Supremacy in life leads to supremacy in the afterlife."

Life Goes On.flavor:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate
Life Goes On.name: Life Goes On

Sandblast.flavor: In the Shifting Wastes, more are killed by sand than by steel.

Druid's Deliverance.flavor: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

Oketra's Last Mercy.flavor: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.

Hour of Revelation.flavor: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.
Hour of Revelation.name: Hour of Revelation

This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield.

Hour of Reckoning.flavor:
"Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."

Hour of Eternity.flavor: To serve as an eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

Hour of Eternity.text: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

Hour of Glory.flavor: The gods of the trials also faced the opportunity to prove themselves worthy.

Hour of Devastation.flavor:
"Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."
—Nicol Bolas

Hour of Devastation.text: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.

Hour of Promise.flavor: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.

Collective Blessing.flavor: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.

God-Pharaoh's Faithful.text: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.

Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh.text:
+2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.
−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

God-Pharaoh's Gift.name: God-Pharaoh's Gift
God-Pharaoh's Gift.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. It gains haste until end of turn.

Zealot of the God-Pharaoh.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.
Zealot of the God-Pharaoh.name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
Zealot of the God-Pharaoh.text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

Throne of the God-Pharaoh.flavor:
"When the Second Sun rests between the horns on the horizon, so begins the Hour of Revelation. Then the Hour of Glory, the Hour of Promise, and finally the Hour of Eternity."
—The Accounting of Hours
Throne of the God-Pharaoh.name: Throne of the God-Pharaoh
Throne of the God-Pharaoh.text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.

The Scorpion God.name: The Scorpion God
The Scorpion God.text:
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
{1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

The Locust God.name: The Locust God
The Locust God.text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste.
{2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

The Scarab God.name: The Scarab God
The Scarab God.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
{2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

To the Slaughter.flavor:
"Where has little Gossamer gone?"
—Thaniel, Gatstaf shepherd
To the Slaughter.name: To the Slaughter
To the Slaughter.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead that player sacrifices a creature and a planeswalker.

Thoughtflare.flavor: "If this is thinking, I don't know what I was doing before."
Thoughtflare.name: Thoughtflare
Thoughtflare.text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

Cyclonic Rift.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
Cyclonic Rift.name: Cyclonic Rift
Cyclonic Rift.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Leshrac's Rite.flavor:
"Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer
Leshrac's Rite.name: Leshrac's Rite
Leshrac's Rite.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

Razaketh's Rite.flavor: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."
Razaketh's Rite.name: Razaketh's Rite
Razaketh's Rite.text:
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Torment of Hailfire.name: Torment of Hailfire
Torment of Hailfire.text: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

Gang of Devils.flavor:
"Well, how could I know they'd explode?"
—Gregel, township militia
Gang of Devils.name: Gang of Devils
Gang of Devils.text: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

Wolf of Devil's Breach.flavor:
"How can werewolves be considered abominations next to such creatures?"
—Arlinn Kord
Wolf of Devil's Breach.name: Wolf of Devil's Breach
Wolf of Devil's Breach.text: Whenever Wolf of Devil's Breach attacks, you may pay {1}{R} and discard a card. If you do, Wolf of Devil's Breach deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost.

Psychic Intrusion.name: Psychic Intrusion
Psychic Intrusion.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

Torment of Scarabs.flavor: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.
Torment of Scarabs.name: Torment of Scarabs
Torment of Scarabs.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.

Deity of Scars.name: Deity of Scars
Deity of Scars.text:
Trample
Deity of Scars enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{B/G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Deity of Scars: Regenerate Deity of Scars.

Nest of Scarabs.flavor:
"They are small, but they always want more. Learn from them."
—Bontu, god of ambition
Nest of Scarabs.name: Nest of Scarabs
Nest of Scarabs.text: Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, create that many 1/1 black Insect creature tokens.

Jester's Mask.name: Jester's Mask
Jester's Mask.text:
Jester's Mask enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from their hand on top of their library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles their library.

Mizzix's Mastery.name: Mizzix's Mastery
Mizzix's Mastery.text:
Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.
Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Geralf's Masterpiece.name: Geralf's Masterpiece
Geralf's Masterpiece.text:
Flying
Geralf's Masterpiece gets -1/-1 for each card in your hand.
{3}{U}, Discard three cards: Return Geralf's Masterpiece from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Lich's Mastery.name: Lich's Mastery
Lich's Mastery.text:
Hexproof
You can't lose the game.
Whenever you gain life, draw that many cards.
Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, exile a permanent you control or a card from your hand or graveyard.
When Lich's Mastery leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

Liliana's Mastery.flavor: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."
Liliana's Mastery.name: Liliana's Mastery
Liliana's Mastery.text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Imprisoned in the Moon.flavor: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.
Imprisoned in the Moon.name: Imprisoned in the Moon
Imprisoned in the Moon.text:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

Trial of Solidarity.flavor: "You will succeed as one or fail as many."
Trial of Solidarity.name: Trial of Solidarity
Trial of Solidarity.text:
When Trial of Solidarity enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Solidarity to its owner's hand.

Trial of Knowledge.name: Trial of Knowledge
Trial of Knowledge.text:
When Trial of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard a card.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Knowledge to its owner's hand.

Trial of Ambition.name: Trial of Ambition
Trial of Ambition.text:
When Trial of Ambition enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Ambition to its owner's hand.

Trial of Zeal.name: Trial of Zeal
Trial of Zeal.text:
When Trial of Zeal enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Zeal to its owner's hand.

Trial of Strength.name: Trial of Strength
Trial of Strength.text:
When Trial of Strength enters the battlefield, create a 4/2 green Beast creature token.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Strength to its owner's hand.

Cartouche of Solidarity.name: Cartouche of Solidarity
Cartouche of Solidarity.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Solidarity enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

Cartouche of Knowledge.flavor: Cartouches chronicle the initiates' achievements in the trials.
Cartouche of Knowledge.name: Cartouche of Knowledge
Cartouche of Knowledge.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Knowledge enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

Cartouche of Ambition.name: Cartouche of Ambition
Cartouche of Ambition.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Ambition enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

Cartouche of Zeal.flavor: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.
Cartouche of Zeal.name: Cartouche of Zeal
Cartouche of Zeal.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

Cartouche of Strength.name: Cartouche of Strength
Cartouche of Strength.text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Strength enters the battlefield, you may have enchanted creature fight target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

Frontline Devastator.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.
Frontline Devastator.name: Frontline Devastator
Frontline Devastator.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Neheb, the Eternal.flavor:
"This is what glory looks like."
—Nicol Bolas
Neheb, the Eternal.name: Neheb, the Eternal
Neheb, the Eternal.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

Neheb, the Worthy.name: Neheb, the Worthy
Neheb, the Worthy.text:
First strike
Other Minotaurs you control have first strike.
As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, Minotaurs you control get +2/+0.
Whenever Neheb, the Worthy deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.

Spellweaver Eternal.flavor:
"They were once our brothers and sisters."
—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate
Spellweaver Eternal.name: Spellweaver Eternal
Spellweaver Eternal.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

Eternal of Harsh Truths.flavor:
"If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?"
—Jace Beleren
Eternal of Harsh Truths.name: Eternal of Harsh Truths
Eternal of Harsh Truths.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

Proven Combatant.flavor: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."
Proven Combatant.name: Proven Combatant
Proven Combatant.text: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

Champion of Wits.name: Champion of Wits
Champion of Wits.text:
When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.
Eternalize {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

Gravedigger.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
Gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
Gravedigger.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Dreamstone Hedron.flavor: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.
Dreamstone Hedron.name: Dreamstone Hedron
Dreamstone Hedron.text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

Dreamstealer.name: Dreamstealer
Dreamstealer.text:
Menace
Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.
Eternalize {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

Ammit Eternal.name: Ammit Eternal
Ammit Eternal.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal.
Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

Dread Wanderer.name: Dread Wanderer
Dread Wanderer.text:
Dread Wanderer enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}{B}: Return Dread Wanderer from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only if you have one or fewer cards in hand.

Lord of the Pit.name: Lord of the Pit
Lord of the Pit.text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

Geth, Lord of the Vault.name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
Geth, Lord of the Vault.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
{X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.

Lord of the Undead.flavor: "Do not weep at your defeat, my dear. In death, you will serve a greater purpose—mine."
Lord of the Undead.name: Lord of the Undead
Lord of the Undead.text:
Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

Lord of the Unreal.flavor: "The dream does not end until I say so."
Lord of the Unreal.name: Lord of the Unreal
Lord of the Unreal.text: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Lord of the Void.name: Lord of the Void
Lord of the Void.text:
Flying
Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

Lord of the Accursed.flavor: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.
Lord of the Accursed.name: Lord of the Accursed
Lord of the Accursed.text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.

Indulgent Tormentor.flavor: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.
Indulgent Tormentor.name: Indulgent Tormentor
Indulgent Tormentor.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

Talisman of Indulgence.name: Talisman of Indulgence
Talisman of Indulgence.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Talisman of Indulgence deals 1 damage to you.

Indulgent Aristocrat.flavor: "If you're not surrounded by decadence, my question to you is—why not?"
Indulgent Aristocrat.name: Indulgent Aristocrat
Indulgent Aristocrat.text:
Lifelink
{2}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

Sultai Ascendancy.name: Sultai Ascendancy
Sultai Ascendancy.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

Sultai Charm.flavor: "Strike," the fumes hiss. "Raise an empire with your ambition."
Sultai Charm.name: Sultai Charm
Sultai Charm.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target monocolored creature.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.

Sultai Flayer.flavor: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."
Sultai Flayer.name: Sultai Flayer
Sultai Flayer.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

Sultai Scavenger.flavor: Since they guard armies of walking carrion, Sultai aven are never far from a meal.
Sultai Scavenger.name: Sultai Scavenger
Sultai Scavenger.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying

Sultai Soothsayer.flavor: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.
Sultai Soothsayer.name: Sultai Soothsayer
Sultai Soothsayer.text: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Sultai Banner.flavor: Power to dominate, cruelty to rule.
Sultai Banner.name: Sultai Banner
Sultai Banner.text:
{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.
{B}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Sultai Banner: Draw a card.

Sultai Emissary.flavor: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.
Sultai Emissary.name: Sultai Emissary
Sultai Emissary.text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Sultai Skullkeeper.flavor: A skullkeeper is the first to arrive after the palace archers strike down intruders, probing their brains for choice bits of knowledge.
Sultai Skullkeeper.name: Sultai Skullkeeper
Sultai Skullkeeper.text: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

Sultai Runemark.name: Sultai Runemark
Sultai Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has deathtouch as long as you control a green or blue permanent. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Sultai Ascendacy.name: Sultai Ascendacy
Sultai Ascendacy.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

Razaketh, the Foulblooded.flavor: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.
Razaketh, the Foulblooded.name: Razaketh, the Foulblooded
Razaketh, the Foulblooded.text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

Bontu the Glorified.name: Bontu the Glorified
Bontu the Glorified.text:
Menace, indestructible
Bontu the Glorified can't attack or block unless a creature died under your control this turn.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
